javafx.concurrent

Class Task.ProgressUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.concurrent.Task.ProgressUpdate
  • Enclosing class:
    Task<V>

    private static final class Task.ProgressUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
    A struct like class that contains the last workDone update information. What we do when updateProgress is called, is we create a new ProgressUpdate object and store it. If it was null, then we fire off a new Runnable using RunLater, which will eventually read the latest and set it to null atomically. If it was not null, then we simply update it.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
